QuestData.Title: Scouting the Shore
QuestData.Description: It's them or us, $c. Only one of us can command this beach.$B$BNorth of here you'll see a small hill with a commanding view of the shoreline. Whoever controls that hill will have the upper hand up and down the shore!$B$BI need to know what the current situation is. Scout the beach head control point, marked by that enormous flag, and return to me.$B$BYou don't have to try to capture it, unless you're spoiling for a fight...
QuestData.LogDescription: Scout the Beach Head Control Point on the Twilight Shore. You don't need to capture it, but doing so will give your side a combat advantage and flag you for PvP.
QuestData.RewardText: That's the lay of the land, soldier. If you're having trouble fighting here on the coast, you might consider pitching in and helping us take and hold that hill.
